Package com.mongodb

Class ServerApi

java.lang.Object
com.mongodb.ServerApi
public final class ServerApi extends Object
A specification of the server API on which the application relies.
Since:
4.3

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static final class 
    ServerApi.Builder
    A builder for ServerApi so that ServerApi can be immutable, and to support easier construction through chaining.
